description: Fix Environment Errors - Fix runMe.sh scripts and document package requirements for 16 languages with environment errors preventing them from running in Docker

userStories.title: Fix Ada runMe.sh and document
userStories.description: As a developer, I want Ada to run correctly when gnat is installed.
acceptanceCriteria: Check if gnatmake exists in Docker: docker exec sudokusolver-app-1 which gnatmake
Update runMe.sh with proper SOLVER_BINARY, METRICS_FILE, TIMEOUT_SECONDS
Add check_toolchain gnatmake in compile() function
Create/update README.md documenting gnat requirement (apt install gnat)
If gnatmake not installed, script should report env_error gracefully
Test: verify runMe.sh runs without crashing when toolchain missing
userStories.notes: Already properly configured - verified working with 656 iterations

userStories.title: Analyze Assembly architecture requirements
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to understand the current Assembly implementation before creating architecture variants.
acceptanceCriteria: Read Languages/Assembly/Sudoku.s to understand current implementation
Read Languages/Assembly/runMe.sh to understand build process
Identify which architecture the current code targets (x86_64 or ARM64)
Document findings in Languages/Assembly/README.md
Note: Creating architecture variants is out of scope - just document current state
userStories.notes: Both x86_64 (NASM) and ARM64 (GCC) variants exist. Fixed runMe.sh with METRICS_FILE/TIMEOUT_SECONDS. Verified 656 iterations on ARM64.

Create/update README.md documenting FreeBASIC requirement
If fbc not installed, script should report env_error gracefully
Test: verify runMe.sh runs without crashing when toolchain missing
userStories.notes: Fixed runMe.sh, created README.md. fbc is installed in Docker, verified 656 iterations.

userStories.title: Fix Crystal runMe.sh and document
userStories.description: As a developer, I want Crystal to run correctly when crystal is installed.
acceptanceCriteria: Check if crystal exists in Docker: docker exec sudokusolver-app-1 which crystal

Create/update README.md documenting Crystal installation (requires special apt repo setup)
If crystal not installed, script should report env_error gracefully
Test: verify runMe.sh runs without crashing when toolchain missing
userStories.notes: Fixed runMe.sh with proper compile(). Crystal not installed in Docker - properly reports env_error.

userStories.title: Investigate and fix C_Sharp build failure
userStories.description: As a developer, I want C# to build and run correctly.
acceptanceCriteria: Run docker exec -w /app/Languages/C_Sharp sudokusolver-app-1 dotnet build to see error
Identify root cause of build failure
Fix project configuration or code as needed
Update runMe.sh if needed with proper SOLVER_BINARY, METRICS_FILE, TIMEOUT_SECONDS
Create/update README.md with any special requirements
Test: docker exec -w /app/Languages/C_Sharp sudokusolver-app-1 ./runMe.sh ../../Matrices/1.matrix
userStories.notes: Root cause: .csproj targeted net9.0 but Docker has .NET 8.0. Fixed by changing to net8.0. Build now succeeds.

Read existing runMe.sh to understand Jupyter notebook execution method

Add check_toolchain for jupyter or python3 as appropriate
Create/update README.md documenting jupyter requirement (pip install jupyter)
If jupyter not installed, script should report env_error gracefully
userStories.notes: Fixed runMe.sh, created README.md. jupyter is installed, verified 656 iterations.

userStories.title: Investigate and fix Objective-C build failure
userStories.description: As a developer, I want Objective-C to build and run correctly in Linux if possible.
acceptanceCriteria: Run compilation manually to see full error output
Determine if GNUstep or other libraries are needed
If fixable: install dependencies, update runMe.sh
If not fixable in Linux: document as platform-limited like AppleScript
Create/update README.md with requirements or limitations
Update runMe.sh with proper SOLVER_BINARY, METRICS_FILE, TIMEOUT_SECONDS
userStories.notes: GNUstep is installed in Docker. Fixed runMe.sh with better error handling. Created README.md. Verified 445778 iterations on matrix 5.
